transcript: you cannot wish for both strong character and an easy life because the price of one is the other if you're going through hard times then it means that you're paying the price to have the character you ultimately want and if you have an easier life then oftentimes we sacrifice the hard-built character and since most of us probably would identify as having a harder life or the things that we're willing to endure then I think it's just simply asking ourselves did we ultimately want to be the types of people who could endure this thing and if so then we are just walking the journey that will give us the evidence that we are who we say we are
